channel.title: TryndamerePK - 317 - Boss/Nex Armour/Dice/Duel/FUN!
channel.description:
Hello everyone!
Thank you for looking at this annoucement. I am proudly to present to you:
TryndamerePK! Where Your Journey Begins Endlessly!
Credits to:
Shaloxis Ryan TrisidiaX and .1% to sk8rdude461
-Originating from Aggroth-
This server is built to make it affordable for TryndamerePK'ians/players - Aggrothian to be able to play. Our purpose is to allow everyone to have the most fun they can get while they are here and their opinions matter. With our stable economy system/drop substantial everyone will enjoy a great time while they are here! We also value our players equally and highly so don't be shy just speak up!
Here is what we have to offer!
Stable Eco! Easy 7+ Bosses Donator Boss only! Fun 26 - adventurous skill(s) Dice System 100% uptime! Guaranteed - Trentahost ++ Pking system/Turmoil/Regular Pray Animation Drop rates +, unlike any other server you don't have to wait that long to get your drops. Easy crystal key drop from rockcrabs and other monster to use to get Barrow(s) piece Awesome donation system 100% dungeoneering system! Donator benefits - monsters that are capable of dropping more rares (pink phat and black phat) and more! 100% no dupes! all patched/ Cheat client's Checked destruct as well! Trivia Bot Awesome Donor stores
Forum: [a href="http://tryndamerepk.proboards.com/"]Home | Forum[/a] Download Client link:
2) Download the client, and run: [url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/s6rlztz38myfdv3/TryndamerePK.jar?dl=0&m=]https://www.dropbox.com/s/s6rlztz38myfdv3/TryndamerePK.jar?dl=0&m=[/url]
3) Your set to go! Have fun! and tell your friends!
(we are currently going to move forums + Underconstruction (vote&donation)
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Zq1ohSabzHs&feature=youtu.be]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Zq1ohSabzHs&feature=youtu.be[/url]
Drop party @ 10 player - 20 - 30 - 35 so forth!
Front page [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2ufyed5.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2uqboft.png[/img]
Turmoil [img]http://i62.tinypic.com/spun3c.jpg[/img]
Easy Master Pking shop ( log in and buy some gear and pk!) [img]http://i60.tinypic.com/2lcntoy.jpg" style[/img]
Dice arena! [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/be67nd.png[/img]

Hello everyone!

Thank you for looking at this annoucement. I am proudly to present to you:

TryndamerePK! Where Your Journey Begins Endlessly!

Credits to:

and .1% to sk8rdude461

This server is built to make it affordable for TryndamerePK’ians/players - Aggrothian to be able to play. Our purpose is to allow everyone to have
